Headline: #134 Stockton/LaSalle Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 134 Stockton/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Michigan, LSDr, LaSalle and Stockton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#134 Stockton/LaSalle Express buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Wacker, Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle and Stockton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 135 Clarendon/LaSalle Exp. buses rrtd NB  Wckr, Mch, Inner, LaSalle, Stoktn, Cannon, Sheridan to LSDr; SB LSDr, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stktn LaS, Inner, Mich.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

Northbound buses are rerouted via Wacker, Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sherida to Lake Shore Drive.

Southbound buses are rerouted via Lake Shore drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan, to Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
